# title

**Instance Property**

The localized string title of the item.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The title should be localized into the current user’s locale.

## Inspecting the General Display Properties

- **badgeCount**: A badging integer for this item.
- **topShelfItems**: An array of content items that are the items of a section.
